Endless Romance is a high-quality quest mod that adds a massive amount of new story and depth to your ES2 playthroughs.
------------------ Features ------------------
Character Plot Webs: Adds deep, fleshed out (and romanceable) characters to your ES2 playthroughs. Released Dec 2017.
Adventures: Adds shorter quest lines that inject interesting events, mysteries, stories and dillemas into your ES2 games. Released Dec 2017.
History System: Adds a large assortment of buildable histories, based on your story choices during your playthrough of Endless Romance. Histories are like mini-wonder buildings that provide a thematic bonus (flat + scaling) and make your empire feel more personalized and storied. Adds more than 6 Illustrations. Released Jan 2018.
New Heroes: Recruit the characters you meet in stories to govern your worlds and guide your fleets. Released Jan 2018.
----------------- Content -----------------
Total Content: adds more than 1 Romanceable Hero, 34 New Events, 85 Unique Choices, 19 Different Endings, 3 Exciting Epilogues, 8 Buildable Histories, and 18 Original Illustrations.
---
Aurelia: Meet a charming, golden-eyed trade princess and her people. Save--or exploit--her crew when they ask for help. Form a trade alliance, resettle them as refugees on your homeworld, or maybe just process them for food or dust. Take Aurelia on as an advisor or a lover. Visit an uninhabited, primal moon and forge a deep bond based on love, trust and mutual respect.
New Character Plot Web, adding the new hero, "Aurelia the Lover," and more than 26 Events, 67 Choices, 11 Endings, 0 Histories, and 5 Illustrations. Released Dec 2017
---
Temporal Anomaly: Investigate strange flashes of light at the edge of one of your systems. Do your best to avoid a mysterious black hole. Investigate a derelict, ghost ship.
New Adventure, adding more than 2 Events, 5 Choices, 4 Endings, 1 Epilogue, 4 Histories, and 4 Illustrations. Released Dec 2017
---
The Warship: Hunt down a stealthy enemy shuttle. Capture prisoners and interrogate them for information. Uncover their secret mission and make an important diplomatic choice. Confiscate an advanced vessel of war. Endure a viral outbreak.
New Adventure, adding more than 5 Events, 13 Choices, 4 Endings, 2 Epilogues, 4 Histories and 3 Illustrations. Released Jan 2018
